name: Deduplication Tool
brief: A Business Central extension for identifying and managing duplicate data records with visual diff capabilities.
description: This extension provides comprehensive tools to detect duplicate records in your Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central database. It includes configurable deduplication engines, visual diff controls for comparing records, and utilities for data cleanup. Features include source data management, match detection algorithms, permission-based access control, and integration with Business Central's standard merge functionality. Designed for cloud-first deployment with support for on-premises environments.
